page.title: 04FARMING STATISTICS
page.content: {NO.FARMS USING}:TRACTORS 8 TRAILERS 8 WINCH 2 DISC-HARROW 5 CULTIVATOR 6 HEDGE-CUTTER 8 MOWER 7 MUCK-SPREADER 4 SEED-DRILL 6 POTATO-PLANTER 1 FERTILISER-SPREADER 8 FORAGE-HARVESTER 5 COMBINE HARVESTER 7 MILKING MACHINES 1 ANIMAL TRANSPORTERS/BOXES 6 BALER 8 COMPUTORS 1 {CROPSPRAYING}:FROM TRACTOR 7 BY HAND 1 FROM PLANE 1 {FERTILISERS}:CHEMICAL FERTILISERS 7 ORGANIC FERTILISERS 4 {ANIMALS}:SHEEP 3 BEEF CATTLE 5 DAIRY CATTLE 1 PIGS 2 GOATS 1 POULTRY 2 HORSES 3 {FARMS PRODUCING}:WHEAT 5 BARLEY 7 OIL SEED RAPE 2 PASTURE 5 HAY 6 SILAGE 2 FRUIT 2 TIMBER 2 {WORK FORCE}:FULL-TIME 23 PART-TIME 18 SECRETARIAL 2 {BUILDINGS}:FARM-HOUSES 7 COTTAGES 13 BARNS 18 ANIMAL HOUSING 6
